column1: prompt

Imagine that you are a reporter. Write a news report of 50 words or less based on the following input. Florida Governor Ron DeSantis introduced a bill proposing to make all public areas of the state smoke-free.
Given the input string, identify the type of word (adjective, adverb, noun, etc.) excitement
Construct a sentence using the given verb in the past tense shudder

Write a poem that follows the given rhyme pattern. Rhyme pattern:
AABB
Categorize the given sentence as either an imperative or a declarative sentence. Have a nice day.

Suggest a way to optimize the given code for efficiency. def calculate_total_sum(list): 
  sum = 0
  for element in list: 
    sum += element 
  return sum
Make a one sentence prediction of the stock market using the given information. Data: The S&P 500 index is currently trading higher for the seventh consecutive day.

Provide two examples of movie genres.

Given the following poem, suggest a different title. The world is full of complexity,
Though structure keeps it in check.
Our lives are like tiny drops of water
That never have time to reflect.

He begged his father for money to buy it, but his father said no and ordered him to go to bed. As he was going to bed, the boy saw a five-dollar bill on the counter, which he took and bought the candy.
